headline: Extra Space Storage Inc. (EXR): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Extra Space Storage Inc. (NYSE:EXR) on Monopolistic Investor’s Substack by Antoni Nabzdyk. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on EXR. Extra Space Storage Inc. (NYSE:EXR)’s share was trading at $148.09 as of Dec 27th. EXR’s trailing and forward P/E were 39.49 and 28.82 respectively according to Yahoo […]
